title: It's there any difference between chain store and store chain? - Quora

response.answer_text: A store chain is a collection of stores owned by a single company (or are franchised by a single company) that share an identity, supply chains, and other operating services. Examples include WalMart, Target, McDonalds, Aldi Süd, and many others. A chain store is a particular store that is part of a store chain. Examples include the Starbucks on the corner, the GAP at your closest mall, and many others.
